shows.title: Millie Turner
shows.desc: Visual artist turned musical artist, Millie Turner delivers left-of-centre, chilled-out, synth-soaked club anthems that have a knack of burrowing themselves into your soul. She sings with an understated but beguiling, almost world-weary maturity that belies her youth. We hear echoes of Ella Vos and Morgan Saint but with a style that’s all her own: the NME praises her “deviously crafted” songs.
